title: Short-Term Course for Enhancing University Mathematics and Statistics Competencies via Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics and statistics concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Educational environment where learner-managers execute role-linked projects, receiving scaffolding support via no-code platforms (Genially/Canva, etc.) using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can complete projects solving business problems using five or more core statistical techniques (e.g., regression analysis, hypothesis testing)
Learners can independently design step-by-step strategies when solving complex mathematical problems by referencing scaffolding materials
Learners can evaluate metacognitive strategies during the learning process and propose improvement plans by writing reflective journals
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
